name: hardhat-cross-chain
description: Template for cross-chain testing on Hardhat

scripts.log-setup: mkdir -p logs && echo 'Starting deployment. Check logs for details :)'
scripts.fork:ethereum: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=69 yarn hardhat customFork --n ethereum --b 21625925 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/ethereum-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:polygon: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=42  yarn hardhat customFork --n polygon --b  66703587 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/polygon-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:sepolia: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=11169111 yarn hardhat customFork --n sepolia --b 7200064 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/sepolia-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:amoy: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=80042 yarn hardhat customFork --n amoy --b 16869384 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/amoy-fork-node.log

author: Dan Hepworth <dhepworth@aktarytech.com>
